meanings.definition: Behavior or language that is offensive or morally unacceptable.
meanings.sent1: The indecency of his actions shocked everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reprimanded the student for his indecency in class.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show used humor to highlight the indecency of the character's behavior.
meanings.sent4: The indecency of the graffiti on the wall was a blight on the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The indecency of the situation left a lasting impression on the witnesses.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indecent.
meanings.sent1: The indecency of the painting made it unsuitable for public display.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the indecency of the movie she watched.
meanings.sent3: The indecency of the situation was so absurd that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The indecency of the storm's destruction was a stark reminder of nature's power.
meanings.sent5: The indecency of the dress caught everyone's attention at the event.
